content.content: 1. The form titled “Certificate”, dated November 3, 2021 and available on the internet at the Ontario Court Forms website, may be used for the purposes of subsections 2 (2) and 5 (1) of the Act.
content.raw_html: 1. The form titled “Certificate”, dated November 3, 2021 and available on the internet at the Ontario Court Forms website, may be used for the purposes of subsections 2 (2) and 5 (1) of the Act.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
